name: APH Iceland Tumblr Dash Theme (Variation 1)
description: My first variation of an Iceland theme. Because who wouldn't want the #bestintheworld on your dash?

user.name: bootslots
user.about:
Hello I am bootslots. I suck at themes but for some reason people asked me to make my own theme public so Erisolsprite Theme was made. 

I may do requests if you ask on my tumblr very nicely, but don't expect great work because I suck.
